title: Arrested Development fans UNITE!
body:
As many of you already know, we're hosting an ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT MARATHON at the Belmonte on Saturday, May 20th. I'd like to show at least 10 episodes, but I need your help deciding which ones. If you jump over to tv.com you can view a listing of all the episodes from all the seasons. Let me know which ones are you favorites, or which ones you'd like to see, and I'll tally up the votes to find out which ones get played. I think the pilot episode is a given...

Season 3, by the way, isn't completely out of the question, but for the sake of this post, let's pretend it is. Thanks for your help guys!
author: Dan

comments.author: Laura
comments.body:
It's hard to whittle down my list of favorite episodes because I love them all. Here's the short list of what I came up with:

From Season 1:
Expanded Pilot
Pier Pressure ("And that's why you always leave a note")

From Season 2:
Immaculate Election ("Steve Holt is a bastard")
Afternoon Delight
Motherboy XXX

From Season 3:
Fakin' It ("My name is Judge" and the Hung Jury!)

Good luck narrowing your list down to 10. Sheesh!

comments.author: --Jeff
comments.body:
Yeah, I tried to come up with just ten. Impossible.

Was S.O.B.S in Season 3 where they held the "TBA Fundraiser" event at the beginning? It seemed like it was much earlier, maybe S2.

I know S3 is possibly off limits, but I remember that episode SLAYING me...

Agreeing with Laura, Pier Pressure should be in for sure as well as the full pilot.

Bringing up Buster
Key Decisions
Shock and Aww
and Missing Kitty round out my S1.

Season 2:

The One Where They Build a House
Afternoon Delight
Motherboy XXX
The Immaculate Election
The Sword of Destiny ("May I have the trick sword please?")

That's tough, I want to see them all. Somebody else?

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: Well, it seems everyone wants Afternoon Delight, and I will add to that. I also really love "Righteous Brothers". But I think for the sake of AD virgins like Nate, and for the overall cohesiveness and hilarity of the marathon, if possible, you should show ten episodes in a row. For example ep.'s 1-10 or 15-25. Because the show has a lot of main jokes that run through several episodes, and seeing them together would prob. be funnier than seeing 10 random (although hilarious) episodes. So, I suggest to see which ones people request and then play the ten ep. block that contains the most requested ep.'s possible. But it will be the best marathon ever either way, just a suggestion.

comments.author: Tammy Kirks
comments.body:
Wow. This is a tough decision. My all-time favorite episode is "Meet the Veals," but there are so many other great ones, especially with Liza Minnelli. So here's my suggestions:

Pilot - extended version
Visiting Ours
Pier Pressure
Missing Kitty
Good Grief!
Afternoon Delight
Burning Love
Motherboy XXX
Meet The Veals

Also, the episode where George Sr. installs a hot tub in the attic just kills me. I can't remember the name. I'm all for skipping the first episodes in Season 3 (I blame Charlize Theron for AD's demise), but the ending ones where Tobias is working at the "restaurant" are hilarious.
